titles.title: A bill to amend title 1 of the United States Code to clarify the effect and application of legislation.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S12940-12941)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

bill.summary: 9/14/1994--Introduced. Declares that any Act of Congress enacted after the effective date of this Act shall be prospective in application only and shall not create a private claim or cause of action or preempt any other State or Federal law, unless a provision of such Act clearly expresses a contrary intention and specifically refers to the provision of this Act intended to be negated.
